entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning with a few flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023
